entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Rain or snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
